statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: MaCio Teague scored 27 points, hitting five of UNC Asheville's 13 3-pointers , and the Bulldogs defeated Charleston Southern 83-73 on Monday night.
article.headline: Teague scores 27, Asheville tops Charleston Southern 83-73
article.linkText: Teague scores 27, Asheville tops Charleston Southern 83-73
article.story: ASHEVILLE, N.C. -- MaCio Teague scored 27 points, hitting five of UNC Asheville's 13 3-pointers , and the Bulldogs defeated Charleston Southern 83-73 on Monday night. Ahmad Thomas added 19 points and Raekwon Miller 15 for the Bulldogs (11-8, 4-2 Big South), who have won three straight. UNC Asheville shot 62 percent for the game (29 of 47), going 13 of 21 behind the arc. Teague opened the game with back-to-back 3-pointers and fed Thomas for a layup before Thomas hit a 3 for an 11-0 lead. The lead stayed around 10 until Christian Keeling had a 4-point play to spark a 7-2 run that pulled the Buccaneers within 47-42 at the half. Charleston Southern got with two several times before a 27-9 run made it a 20-point game with less than five minutes to go. Asheville made 8 of 9 shots, including all three of its 3-pointers and went 8 of 9 from the line. Six different players scored with five getting more than two. Keeling had 22 points for Charleston Southern (6-11, 1-5), which has lost five straight.
